languages.text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

languages.text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.
До конца боя воин не может совершать Рывок, а количество его ОП уменьшается на 3.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes kann der Krieger Ansturm nicht nutzen, und seine BP sind um −3 reduziert.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le guerrier ne peut pas utiliser Charge et ses PD sont réduits de −3.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

languages.text: 直到战斗结束，战士无法再使用英勇冲锋，而且移动点数降低3点。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, el guerrero no puede usar Carga y sus PM se reducen en −3.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、ファイターは突撃を使用できず、MPが-3減少する。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

languages.text: Savaşçı, çatışma sonuna dek Hücum kabiliyetini kullanamaz ve HP'si 3 puan azalır.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.
